title: What is the meaning of the song “These Days” by Nico? - Quora

response.answer_text: As a bit of trivia, this song was written by Jackson Browne when he was 16 years old. His version is superb, and it’s been covered by by many including Gregg Allman, Tom Rush, John Cowan (New Grass Revival). Nico’s was the first recording of it to be released.
Counter to popular belief, the song is not about “These Days”. It is actually about THOSE DAYS. In other word, any days but THESE.
